Package com.spec.web.expresso.message

Interface Request

All Known Implementing Classes:
HttpRequest
public interface Request
Represent a Http request

  • Method Details

    • body

      String body() throws IOException
      Returns the body(payload) of the Http request
      Returns:
      The body of the request
      Throws:
      IOException - May throw and IOException if it cannot read the body of response.

    • getRouteParams

      String getRouteParams(String name)
      Get the route parameter value against the given name.
      Parameters:
      name - name of the parameter , this name should be same as the name of the parameter mentioned in the url pattern
      Returns:
      value of the parameter

    • getUrlParams

      String getUrlParams(String name)
      Return the query/search parameter value against the name
      Parameters:
      name - name of the query parameter
      Returns:
      value of the query parameter

    • getRequestPath

      String getRequestPath()
      Retrives the path of the current request url.
      Returns:
      the path of the current request

    • getMimeType

      String getMimeType(String fileName)
      Returns the mime type of file passed to it.
      Parameters:
      fileName - The file for which the mime type should be found out.
      Returns:
      MIME type of file

    • getCookies

      jakarta.servlet.http.Cookie[] getCookies()
      Returns list of cookies sent by the client
      Returns:
      List of cookies

    • getReader

      Reader getReader() throws IOException
      Returns a reader object to read request body.
      Returns:
      Reader instance to read request body.
      Throws:
      IOException - IOException

    • getHeader

      String getHeader(String headerName)
      Returns the value of header for the specified header name.
      Parameters:
      headerName - The name of the header.
      Returns:
      Value of the header.
